title: One Piece Ep.128 Review
author: bxerblog
description: Episode review describing Episode 128 as 'great and super funny!' The reviewer highlights memorable scenes that have become iconic One Piece moments.

title: Never Watched One Piece - Episode 128 Commentary
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: First-time viewer's commentary noting the episode's friendship theme and stating they 'honestly could not stop smiling while watching this one.'

title: One Piece Episode 128-130 Reaction/Review
author: SprinkleVerse
description: Patreon-exclusive reaction and review video covering episodes 128-130 of One Piece, focusing on the emotional ending of the Arabasta arc.

title: Episode 128 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 128 containing episode details, plot summary, character appearances, production credits, and trivia.

title: Chapter 213 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 213 'VIP' which Episode 128 partially adapts, containing detailed plot summary and character information.

title: Chapter 214 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 214 'Strategy to Escape the Sand Kingdom' which Episode 128 partially adapts, detailing the escape plan and Vivi's decision setup.

title: Family - One Piece Character Song
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information about the ending song 'Family' performed by the Straw Hat Pirates, which Oda stated was the most popular character song and one he personally loves.

title: Terracotta Character Page
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character information page for Terracotta, including her debut, role as royal chef and seamstress, relationship to Igaram, and voice actor details.

title: Ho (Dr. Ho) Character Page
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character information for Dr. Ho, the palace physician who admires Chopper's medical knowledge and techniques from Drum Island.
